org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.api.statetracker

Interface IterateAndUpdate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IterateAndUpdateImpl

    public interface IterateAndUpdate
    Iterates and updates over the possible updates. This is meant for use by the org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.tracker.statetracker.UpdateSaver to handle iterating over the ids and doing something with the updates. This will usually be via the: org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.akka.DeepLearningAccumulator to handle collapsing updates avoiding having them all in memory at once

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accumulate()
      Accumulates the updates in to a result by iterating over each possible worker and obtaining the mini batch updates for each.
      Job accumulated()
      The accumulated result
